title: Thai Green Chicken Curry Recipe | Waitrose

ingredients.item: 400g essential Waitrose British chicken breast chunks
3 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Thai green curry paste
225g Waitrose trimmed sugar snap peas, cut in half lengthwise
1 lime, cut into wedges, to serve

instructions.step: Pour the stock into the pan and add the chicken, potatoes, curry paste and lime leaves. Bring to the boil and simmer for 20-25 minutes, until the vegetables and chicken are cooked through.
Add the aubergine and simmer for 5-8 minutes, until cooked.
Meanwhile, place the unopened sachet of creamed coconut in a bowl. Cover with water and set aside for 5 minutes until melted.
Add the creamed coconut, sugar snaps and bamboo shoots to the pan and stir well to combine. Simmer for a further 3-5 minutes, then stir in the basil leaves. Serve with the rice and lime wedges.
